text: Hannu Olavi Mikkola (24 May 1942 âˆ’ 26 February 2021) was a Finnish world champion rally driver. He was a seven-time winner of the 1000 Lakes Rally in Finland and won the RAC Rally in Great Britain four times. Mikkola was born in Joensuu, Finland. Mikkola died on 26 February 2021 in Helsinki, aged 78.Rallying great Hannu Mikkola dies, aged 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Finnish racecar drivers
title: Hannu Mikkola
